00114   public:
00115     /**************************************************************************/
00120     /**************************************************************************/
00121     enum OA_EXCEPTION 
00122     {
00123       E_NO_MEMORY,      
00124       E_NO_PAGES,       
00125       E_BAD_BOUNDARY,   
00126       E_MULTIPLE_FREE,  
00127       E_CORRUPTED_BLOCK 
00128     };
00129     
00130     /**************************************************************************/
00140     /**************************************************************************/
00141     OAException(OA_EXCEPTION ErrCode, const std::string& Message) : 
00142                 error_code_(ErrCode), message_(Message) {};
00143                   
00144     /**************************************************************************/
00149     /**************************************************************************/
00150     virtual ~OAException() {
00151     }
00152     
00153     /**************************************************************************/
00160     /**************************************************************************/
00161     OA_EXCEPTION code(void) const { 
00162       return error_code_; 
00163     }
00164     
00165     /**************************************************************************/
00172     /**************************************************************************/
00173     virtual const char *what(void) const {
00174       return message_.c_str();
00175     }
00176   private:  
00177     OA_EXCEPTION error_code_;   
00178     std::string message_;       
00179 };

00181 /**************************************************************************/
00186 /**************************************************************************/
00187 struct OAConfig
00188 {
00189   static const size_t BASIC_HEADER_SIZE = sizeof(unsigned) + 1;
00191   static const size_t EXTERNAL_HEADER_SIZE = sizeof(void*);
00193   
00194   /**************************************************************************/
00199   /**************************************************************************/
00200   enum HBLOCK_TYPE{hbNone, hbBasic, hbExtended, hbExternal};
00201   
00202   /**************************************************************************/
00207   /**************************************************************************/
00208   struct HeaderBlockInfo
00209   {
00210     HBLOCK_TYPE type_;      
00211     size_t size_;           
00212     size_t additional_;     
00213     /**************************************************************************/
00222     /**************************************************************************/
00223     HeaderBlockInfo(HBLOCK_TYPE type = hbNone, unsigned additional = 0) : 
00224                     type_(type), size_(0), additional_(additional)
00225     {
00226       if (type_ == hbBasic)
00227         size_ = BASIC_HEADER_SIZE;
00228       else if (type_ == hbExtended) // alloc # + use counter + flag byte + user-defined
00229         size_ = sizeof(unsigned int) + sizeof(unsigned short) + 
00230                 sizeof(char) + additional_;
00231       else if (type_ == hbExternal)
00232         size_ = EXTERNAL_HEADER_SIZE;
00233     };
00234   };
00235   
00236   /**************************************************************************/
00255   /**************************************************************************/
00256   OAConfig(bool UseCPPMemManager = false,
00257            unsigned ObjectsPerPage = DEFAULT_OBJECTS_PER_PAGE, 
00258            unsigned MaxPages = DEFAULT_MAX_PAGES, 
00259            bool DebugOn = false, 
00260            unsigned PadBytes = 0,
00261            const HeaderBlockInfo &HBInfo = HeaderBlockInfo(),
00262            unsigned Alignment = 0) : UseCPPMemManager_(UseCPPMemManager),
00263                                      ObjectsPerPage_(ObjectsPerPage), 
00264                                      MaxPages_(MaxPages), 
00265                                      DebugOn_(DebugOn), 
00266                                      PadBytes_(PadBytes),
00267                                      HBlockInfo_(HBInfo),
00268                                      Alignment_(Alignment)
00269   {
00270     HBlockInfo_ = HBInfo;
00271     LeftAlignSize_ = 0;  
00272     InterAlignSize_ = 0;
00273   }
00274 
00275   bool UseCPPMemManager_;       
00276   unsigned ObjectsPerPage_;     
00277   unsigned MaxPages_;           
00278   bool DebugOn_;                
00279   unsigned PadBytes_;           
00280   HeaderBlockInfo HBlockInfo_;  
00281   unsigned Alignment_;          
00282 
00283   unsigned LeftAlignSize_;      
00284   unsigned InterAlignSize_;     
00285 };
